page.title: 07COMMUNITY AFFAIRS
page.content: IS ABOUT 47 YEARS OLD,AND HE HAS BEEN THERE FOR 9 YEARS.THE MOST EXPENSIVE THING THEY HAVE SOLD IS A BIKE FOR Â£150.{e)CAMERON ROAD POST OFFICE:}THE BUILDING WAS INTENDED TO BE USED AS A RENT OFFICE BUT AS THERE WERE NO SHOPS IN THIS AREA,THEY USED IT AS POST OFFICE & SHOP.WE INTERVIEWED MR BEBBINGTON WHO SAID:THE BUSIEST DAYS AT THE POST OFFICE ARE EITHER MONDAY WHEN PEOPLE COLLECT THEIR CHILD BENIFIT OR THURSDAY,WHEN PEOPLE COLLECT THEIR PENSION.THE POST OFFICE IS NOT ALLOWED TO SELL ANYTHING EXCEPT STAMPS, ENVELOPES, POSTCARDS, ETC.MORE FIRST CLASS STAMPS THAN SECOND CLASS STAMPS ARE SOLD.IT IS POSSIBLE TO SEND VITALLY EVERYTHING BY POST THESEDAYS,EVEN A BIYCLE,WE UNDERSTAND.
